typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		name as string,
		gender as string,
		department as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> SCD1
SCD1 alterRow(updateIf(1==1)) ~> AlterRow
AlterRow sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['Latest_emp.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SCD1output
